ThingDef.label: master Shakalaka dance book
ThingDef.description: An ancient book, written by a master Shakalaka dancer. Within these worn pages are the secrets to mastering Shakalaka dances. Any Lynian can learn these secrets, simply by reading the book. However, the book is not in the best condition, and will likely crumble to dust in the process.\n\nExtremely rare, many copies of this book have seemingly been lost to time itself.
